HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: The Dwarven-throne and other throneroom furniture can now be used to fulfill Royalty-titles. The information on what items are needed might not show the dwarven items due to a limitation in the game, but once the required structure is built it should recognize it. Thanks SoongJr for most of the work on this update!
The original version of this mod has been updated, please use it instead. This version will remain, but unlisted and will not be updated further.
